lead_paragraph: Brazilian international Hulk struck twice in the second half to inspire Zenit St. Petersburg to a 2-0 victory against CSKA Moscow that reignites their Russian Premier League title challenge.

headline.print_headline: Hulk Sinks CSKA Moscow to Reignite Zenit Title Hopes
headline.main: Hulk Sinks CSKA Moscow to Reignite Zenit Title Hopes

snippet: Brazilian international Hulk struck twice in the second half to inspire Zenit St. Petersburg to a 2-0 victory against CSKA Moscow that reignites their Russian Premier League title challenge....
